body.p: In the left pane of the window, click the Menu icon in the Tools banner located above the machine list. The Global Tools menu is displayed.
A drop-down list enables you to select from the following global tools:

li.p: Welcome. Displays the welcome message. The toolbar is also included, to enable you to get started with using .
Extensions. Displays the Extension Pack Manager tool. This tool is used to install and uninstall s. See .
Media. Displays the Virtual Media Manager tool. This tool is used to manage the disk images used by . See .
Network. Displays the Network Manager tool. This tool is used to create and configure some types of networks used by . See .
Cloud. Displays the Cloud Profile Editor tool. This tool is used to configure connections to a cloud service, such as . See .
Activities. Displays the VM Activity Overview tool. This tool is used to monitor performance and resource usage of virtual machines. See .

body.p: The Pin icon is used to keep the Tools banner visible as you scroll down the entries in the machine list.

note.p: The available tools may vary, depending on the selected experience level for the user interface.
